trans-unit.source: Defines how to format the text inside of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 定義如何格式化的文字內<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This enumeration is used by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.CutCopyMaskFormat%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.TextMaskFormat%2A> to control how text is returned—in the first case, by performing a cut and copy operation, and in the second place, by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Text%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個列舉型別由<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.CutCopyMaskFormat%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.TextMaskFormat%2A>控制傳回文字的方式，在第一個案例中，依執行剪下和複製作業，而第二個位置，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Text%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Text%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.TextMaskFormat%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.CutCopyMaskFormat%2A>

trans-unit.source: Return only text input by the user.
trans-unit.target: 傳回只有文字輸入的使用者。

trans-unit.source: Return text input by the user as well as any literal characters defined in the mask.
trans-unit.target: 傳回文字輸入的使用者，以及定義遮罩中的任何常值字元。

trans-unit.source: Return text input by the user as well as any instances of the prompt character.
trans-unit.target: 傳回文字輸入的使用者，以及您在提示字元的任何執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Return text input by the user as well as any literal characters defined in the mask and any instances of the prompt character.
trans-unit.target: 傳回文字輸入的使用者，以及定義在遮罩和提示字元的任何執行個體中任何常值字元。
